data.label: How This Works
data.content:
Daily Meeting Digest

This workflow runs every morning at 9:00 AM and:
1. Reads all .txt transcript files from ~/meetings/transcripts/
2. Sends them to an LLM to extract decisions, action items, and key takeaways
3. Emails the digest to your team

Setup:
- Create ~/meetings/transcripts/ and drop .txt files there
- Configure the Email Send node with your SMTP server
- Update the 'to' address in Email Send config panel
- Arm the schedule using the clock button in the toolbar

To test without waiting for the cron schedule, just click Run.

data.label: Summarizer
data.systemPrompt:
You are a meeting digest assistant. Given meeting transcripts, produce a clear daily digest with these sections:

## Decisions Made
Bullet list of decisions reached

## Action Items
Bullet list with owner and deadline if mentioned

## Key Takeaways
3-5 most important points across all meetings

## Attendance Summary
Who participated in which meetings

Be concise. Use markdown formatting. If no transcripts are provided, say 'No meeting transcripts found for today.'
